insert into tb_redbook_collect( user_id, note_id, xsec_token, display_title, `type`, cover_url, owner_id, owner_nickname, owner_avatar, liked, liked_count, patch_index, collect_index, create_date, create_time, update_time) values
( #{item.userId}, #{item.noteId}, #{item.xsecToken}, #{item.displayTitle}, #{item.type}, #{item.coverUrl}, #{item.ownerId}, #{item.ownerNickname}, #{item.ownerAvatar}, #{item.liked}, #{item.likedCount}, #{item.patchIndex}, #{item.collectIndex}, current_date(), now(), now() )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE display_title=VALUES(display_title), xsec_token=VALUSE(xsec_token), cover_url=VALUES(cover_url), owner_nickname=VALUES(owner_nickname), owner_avatar=VALUES(owner_avatar), liked=VALUES(liked), liked_count=VALUES(liked_count), patch_index=VALUES(patch_index), collect_index=VALUES(collect_index), update_time=now()
mapper.select:
select tc.user_id, tc.note_id, tc.xsec_token, tc.display_title, tc.type, tc.cover_url, tc.owner_id, tc.owner_nickname, tc.owner_avatar, tc.liked, tc.liked_count, tn.note_id as detailId, tn.note_desc, tn.tags, tn.status, tn.pic_path_list from tb_redbook_collect tc left join tb_redbook_note tn on tc.note_id=tn.note_id
tc.user_id = #{userId}
and LOWER(tc.display_title) LIKE LOWER(concat('%', #{displayTitle}, '%'))
and LOWER(tc.owner_nickname) LIKE LOWER(concat('%', #{ownerNickname}, '%'))
order by tc.create_date desc, tc.patch_index asc, tc.collect_index asc
